ygData.msgSnippet: The bladed staff cuts at his stomache, but puts him on guard for the missiles so he dodges them and continues charging at Epyon. ... remember ... and keep ...

The bladed staff cuts at his stomache, but puts him on guard for the 
missiles so he dodges them and continues charging at Epyon.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: Hey who here remembers Amp, or Amperion?  Anyone? Even I don't 
remember 
> where I left him.
> 
> ::Aerotaur/Terrataur/Pyrotaur/Aquataur::
>        He nods.  "Nightlight, I want you and Trinity to stay here 
and keep 
> the autoguns online as long as possible."  He turns to the others 
and thrusts 
> a fist into the air.  "Now is the time to strike!"  He and the other 
> Taurusoids run out of the base.
> 
>        Aerotaur takes flight attacking SS with a spiraling slash of 
his 
> double bladed staff.  He then whips around from the other side and 
fires 4 
> shots at him.
> 
>        Pyrotaur unleashes a stream of flame at the ground troops, 
followed by 
> a stream of water from Aquataur.  The rapid heating and cooling more 
likely 
> to cause damage through expansion and contraction than either one 
separate.
> 
>        Terrataur tunnels under the ground, just below the surface, 
under the 
> enemy bots.  She thus makes it likely to cave in after being shot if 
not 
> under their sheer weight.
> 
> ::Amperion::
>        In his travels, exploring the world he had finally come to 
the western 
> part of North America.  He stood at a distance in a tree watching 
the battle. 
>  "I await the bodies of this battle.  I will surely receive new 
powers."
